greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Distance from n to nearest square.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences related to distance to nearest element of some set
example: a(7)=2 since 9 is the closest square to 7 and |9-7| = 2.
program: a053188 n = min (n - last xs) (head ys - n) where
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 01 2000
